name: Hadoop-hdfs
tagline: Steve's Mirror of Apache Hadoop:  [ FOR LIBHDFS development ]
body:
#LIBHDFS:
##This is a C/JNI Interface to the Hadoop HDFS file system.
***
#My Involvement:
##I became involved/interested in this project through my previous employment at Teradata.
***
#Objectives:
##I hope to merge many of my Teradata enhancements into the Hadoop LIBHDFS project.
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
